Meteara took a moment to situate herself and responded.

Meteara: Yes I do hear you. What kind of thing? And where can I meet 
you?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis/Horn::
>        Horn, despite his newfound ability to speak chose not to and 
so 
> together they arrived at the surface.  They walk over to the crater 
where the 
> artifact landed.  "Huh, I wonder what this thing is."  He takes a 
stick and 
> pokes it.  (Don't ask where he got a stick at the North Pole.  You 
really 
> don't want to know.)  "It doesn't look natural to me eh Horn."  
Horn just 
> looks at him apathetically.  He walks back to the hole in the ice 
and drops a 
> com buoy down into the water to boost his signal.  "Meteara?  Can 
you read 
> me?  There's something up here I think you should see."
